detectors.description: Presale.buyTokens(address) (repairResNew/scscN/MXToken_crowdsaleU2.sol#130-140) ignores return value by token.mint(contributor,amount) (repairResNew/scscN/MXToken_crowdsaleU2.sol#136)

Reentrancy in Presale.buyTokens(address) (repairResNew/scscN/MXToken_crowdsaleU2.sol#130-140):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)((token.totalSupply() + amount) <= maximumCap) (repairResNew/scscN/MXToken_crowdsaleU2.sol#134)
	- token.mint(contributor,amount) (repairResNew/scscN/MXToken_crowdsaleU2.sol#136)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- TokenPurchase(0x0,contributor,msg.value,amount) (repairResNew/scscN/MXToken_crowdsaleU2.sol#137)
	- Transfer(0x0,contributor,amount) (repairResNew/scscN/MXToken_crowdsaleU2.sol#138)
detectors.markdown:
